TrackMyGolf delivers a golf swing analyzer right on your wrist. Watch your golf swing at up to 100 samples per second, as captured by the built-in motion sensors of your Apple Watch. There’s no extra hardware to buy (similar products sell for up to $150).
An Apple Watch is required in order to capture your golf swing analysis.

TrackMyGolf Golf Swing Analyzer Features:

- Find out your golf swing power and speed measured in MPH (speed measured is hand swing speed, not club head speed)
- Visualize your golf swing form in 3D 
- Rotate view in any direction to look at your golf swing from any angle
- Up to 100 samples/second so that you can see details no human eye can capture
- A number of data reported including hand swing speed, tempo, swing plane, impact angle, swing path, grip angle, and golf swing power.
- Swing data stored in the cloud so that you can revisit at any time
- No Internet connection required during swing. Your golf swing analysis saved to cloud when the phone is connected to the Internet later.
- Support both left-handed & right-handed golfer

This golf swing trainer tool is extremely helpful in visualizing your arm movement through the swing. For example, you can visualize how your arm cross over through the impact zone. Another use of the Apple Watch golf swing reader, if you tend to cast early, you can visualize your arm pushing out and swinging outside in to compensate.

Advantages compared to other golf swing analyzers on the market:

- No hardware to buy, just use your Apple Watch. Other analyzers cost $150+
- No calibration, no set up. Start the golf swing trainer app and play. 
- No switching. No need to switch the sensor when you switch the golf club.
- No extra weight. Nothing is attached to the shaft, so your golf swing power and form are never affected. You can even use it on the golf course to capture your game swings.

Please make sure you sign in to iCloud on your phone. This app stores your swing in iCloud so that you can visualize it on phone and review later. 

Limitations: Because the sensor location is on your wrist, you will not see problems associated with your hand. For example, if you flip your hand or un-hinge too early, you will not be able to visualize the problem. However, a hand flip is usually a result of compensating for an early arm casting, so you can get a hint from your arm trajectory.

We appreciate your feedbacks. If you see a problem or have a suggestion, please do not just leave a negative rating (yes 4* is a bad rating, we have a high standard :-)), because we have no idea why. Tell us the problem so that we can improve the product. Better yet, email us directly at support@vimo.co. Like other reviews have mentioned, we provide a speedy support, we typically respond within 30 minutes.

summary.label:
Golfboy is a golf ball trajectory measurement application. 
It can be used by anyone as long as they have an iPhone and a tripod (see iPhone model requirements below).
It uses image analysis technology to measure flying distance, ball speed, launch angle, club speed, etc. in real time.
It also has a course simulation function for more realistic practice.
Putt measurement and automatic recording of swing videos are also available to support all kinds of golf training.

Golfboy uses our self-developed sports analysis technology to make golf more fun and efficient for the general public. Golfboy has been tested against laser-based distance measuring devices already on the market, and accuracy has been improved to the point where it can be used in practice, to take your golf  to the next level.

+ Golfboy is a great way to improve your golf.
+ It is useful for getting a feel for the distance and trajectory of your shots.
+ You can use the app not only at an outdoor driving range, but also indoors or on the course.
+ If you're practicing with a friend,you can use two iPhones and the included pairing function to automatically capture your swing video with shot data on it.
+ In "Round mode", you can  use Golfboy's original virtual courses to simulate practicing on a real course.
The "Form mode" is available on iPhoneSE2 and iPhone11 or later.
Golfboy can measure different distances depending on the lens used on the iPhone.

+ In the case of iPhones with ultra wide angle lenses (assuming the use of a tripod at a height of 4.0ft[1.2m]) It is possible to measure distances of up to 280 yards.

+ If your iPhone does not have the ultra wide angle lens (assuming you use a tripod at a height of 4.0ft[1.2m]),
the distance can be measured up to 220yd.

The distance can be increased by raising the height of the tripod.
If the lighting is too dark or it is difficult to distinguish the color of the ball from the background, the measurement may not be possible. Please check the operation in your preferred environment during the free trial period.

About subscription
Golfboy is free to download, but you will need to register for a subscription to use the measurement functions.
For first time users, there is a two month free trial, after which you will be asked to pay a set fee based on your country of residence as indicated in the app.
Your subscription will be automatically renewed if not cancelled within 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

+ Features provided with the subscription
1) Ball trajectory measurement function by "Shot mode"
2) "Putt mode" to measure ball trajectory in a putting scenario.
3) Course simulation function in "Round mode"
4) Swing video comparison and history management function in "Form mode"
"Form mode" is only available on iPhoneSE2 and iPhone11 or later.

While your subscription is active, you can use the above features as many times as you like with no limit.
Golfboy can also be used to check your past practice records, as it keeps a log of your past shots and swing data.
Golfboy will help you maximize your potential in golf by visualizing your shot data.

You will not be able to access your past practice records after your subscription ends, so please export the records you need during your subscription period by using the share function, posting them to SNS, or saving them on your device.

Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
You can check the terms of use and privacy policy in the app.

If you need support
Please contact us at contact@qonceptstl.com.
